Actually, setting ANY behavior as the classifierBehavior causes a crash. -Greg

It sounds like a containment cycle already exists somewhere in your model; of course it is invalid for an element to directly or indirectly own itself, as enforced by the 'not own self' rule defined on Element.

Note that a change was recently made in EMF which may avoid the stack overflow (see bug 147125), but you're bound to run into other problems if a containment cycle exists.
